alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 12:00AM CDT until March 30 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... Southwestern McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1158 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Criner, moving northeast at 40 mph. Damaging wind gusts may occur in areas of light rain. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southern Norman, Purcell, Noble, Slaughterville, Lexington, Goldsby, Dibble, Washington, Cole and Criner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
